archimate:BusinessService.name: Mobile - on/off Net Charging
archimate:BusinessService.documentation: No difference for on/off net charging. INAP protocol in scope for IWF. Network capability to determine on/off net usage - additional configuration 25-09-2020 - Kayne confirmed - MVNO, not for consumer. Why MVNO Horizon 1? 23-10-2020 - not required discussed in Feature ownership meeting. Comfirmed by Kayne, Summer and James representing Consumer, Business and MVNO.
